reviews.title: average hotel in nice resort
reviews.text: First time I have written a review on Trip Advisor but felt I needed to balance up the rave reviews this hotel gets.

We arrived for our one week stay in the early afternoon and were booked in efficiently but due to the layout of the hotel and pool area we had to walk past the sunbeds and pool area with our cases and 2 young children, just about squeezing past the sunbeds that lined the area - it all felt a bit uncomfortable as new arrivals.
reviews.title: Complete Holiday Friendliness

likes.liked: — Friendliness or staff, cleanliness of hotel and great pool

reviews.text: We had booked a "deluxe" 1 bed apartment but like most things about this hotel it was rather average and really pretty small for a family of 2 adults and 2 children. Though the maid service was very good and ensured we always came back to a clean room
reviews.title: Pleasent

reviews.text: The pool area was quite compact and even though there are two faily large pools these both go pretty deep so unsuitable for young children (ours are 6 and 2). There is a small paddling pool but not right for our 6 year old.
reviews.title: Majorca's best kept secret!

likes.liked: — Atmosphere so relaxed and hassle free

reviews.text: Hardly anyone uses the hotel restaurant in the evening and we always ate out at one of the many superb restaurants in the lovely port. Upon returning to the hotel between 9-10.00 it was rare to see any people, even around the bar area yet the hotel was full so there was a distinct lack of atmosphere about the place. The only evening entertainment we saw was on one occasion the guy who works on recepeption playing the organ!
reviews.title: Nice Hotel in lovely resort

reviews.text: Brilliant time staying here in October half-term, couldn't believe how quiet it was. We have two kids (12 & 8) and there were other kids there, but so quiet. No loud music around the pool, nobody reserving sunbeds, all perfect. The hotel staff very friendly and helpful. Our room overlooked the pool and mountain backdrop, had a nice balcony which we sat on at night at 10pm still warm, even though October. Fridge and cooking facilities if required, but we ate out. Hired a car for the week and explored the sights. You don't need to travel far to find some other lovely spots. The harbour in Port D'Andraitx is lovely with some lovely restaurants, prices do vary.
reviews.title: Great Half-term break
Hotel La Pergola
reviews.text: We had a wonderful stay at the Hotel La Pergola. Four of us stayed in a 2-storey villa with a private patio. Lovely!
We had an excellent breakfast there every day, and dined at the sister hotel, Mon Port, across the road - very elegant.
reviews.title: Nice, But Not For Us!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would particularly like to compliment the staff in reception who went out of their way to make sure our holiday was perfect.
reviews.title: Perfect Apartments in a perfect location!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked in here for three days at the end of our holiday in Andratx. We had been in an apartment, and checked into a one bedroom apartment, with two sofa beds. This was tiny! and no way could both my kids have fitted on the sofa beds, I had been told it would fit four adults, but you would have to be very good friends.
reviews.title: In need of an update, not good value for money...there are some positives

likes.liked: — Nice quite location on other side of bay

reviews.text: We went back to reception, the place seems to be a German company, and all the staff are very efficient and friendly. I said no way could we spend three nights there. He looked very apologetic, said they were very busy, spent ages on the computer, and finally said we could have a bungalow the following two nights, but nothing that night. We went up to Mon Port, the hotel behind owned by the same group, very friendly and efficient, who did us a great deal on a double. So back to La Pergola, and when we said we'd been to Mon Port, miraculously found us a villa for that night only.
reviews.title: average location, rude personnel

likes.liked: — breakfast buffet, main pool, location to the harbour
